overview: Tim LaHaye's Prophecy Institute presents this engaging home video collection that provides an in-depth examination of Biblical prophecy. Featuring the world's foremost Biblical scholars and theologians, including Tim LaHaye (author of the Left Behind series), Ed Hindson and Thomas Ice, this complete collection offers insight into what the Bible reveals about the future, as well as an understanding of the prophecies that have intrigued mankind for centuries. In the Apocalypse lets us know what the Bible has to say about the Apocalypse.
title: End Time Revealed: The Apocalypse
